titles.title: 207 Down From His Splendor (nice, takes work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Down from His splendor in glory He came
Into a world of woe
Took on Himself
All my guilt
And my shame
Why should He love me so

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
How can I help but love Him
When He loved me so
How can I help but love Him
When He loved me so

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am unworthy
To take of His grace
Wonderful grace so free
Yet Jesus suffered
And died in my place
E'en for a soul like me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is fairest
Of thousands to me
His love is sweet and true
Wonderful beauty in Him now I see
More than I ever knew
